skill.name: implementation-review
skill.description: Automatically trigger review agents after task completion. Use when strategic-planner finishes planning tasks (calls plan-consultant) or when main agent completes coding tasks in /implement workflow (calls code-reviewer). Triggers on phrases like "plan complete", "implementation done", "coding finished", "ready for review".
skill.summary: Automatically trigger review agents after task completion in EPIC workflow
skill.author: Emz1998

security_audit.summary: All 14 static findings are false positives. The file is a markdown documentation file with no executable code. Backticks are markdown formatting, not shell execution. No cryptographic algorithms present.

content.value_statement: Manual review processes slow down development workflows. This skill automatically triggers code and plan reviews at key workflow milestones, ensuring quality gates are never skipped while keeping the development process moving efficiently.
actual_capabilities: Automatically detect when strategic-planner completes planning tasks and trigger plan-consultant for review
Detect when main agent finishes coding tasks and invoke code-reviewer for code quality validation
Report structured review findings back to the workflow
Flag critical issues that require revision before proceeding to next phase
limitations: Skill requires EPIC workflow structure to function correctly
Does not perform actual code review itself - delegates to specialized review agents
Cannot override blocked review status - only reports findings

use_cases.title: Enforce Code Review in Development Teams
use_cases.description: Automatically trigger code reviews after every implementation task, ensuring no code merges without proper review. Ideal for teams following TDD practices.

use_cases.title: Quality Gates for Project Planning
use_cases.description: Validate implementation strategies before coding begins. Catch feasibility issues and risks early in the planning phase.
use_cases.target_user: Project leads and architects reviewing project plans

use_cases.title: Automated QA Checkpoints
use_cases.description: Integrate review agents as mandatory quality checkpoints in the CI/CD pipeline, preventing low-quality code from reaching production.
use_cases.target_user: DevOps engineers setting up quality automation

prompt_templates.title: Basic Plan Review
prompt_templates.prompt: The strategic-planner has completed the implementation plan. Please review the plan using the implementation-review skill.

prompt_templates.title: Code Implementation Review
prompt_templates.prompt: I have finished implementing the feature. Use implementation-review to trigger a code review before I commit the changes.

prompt_templates.title: Comprehensive Review Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the current state of my project. Run implementation-review to check if both the plan and code meet quality standards.
prompt_templates.scenario: When you want to validate overall project quality

prompt_templates.title: Post-Sprint Quality Audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Sprint is complete. Run implementation-review across all completed tasks to generate a quality audit report.
prompt_templates.scenario: At the end of a sprint for comprehensive review

output_examples.input: strategic-planner has completed the implementation strategy for feature T001
implementation complete for user authentication module
output: - **Findings:** Minor - Add error handling for edge case

best_practices: Always wait for review completion before proceeding to the next phase
Use the structured report format to track review findings over time
Address critical and high-severity findings before committing code
anti_patterns: Skipping reviews when deadlines are tight
Proceeding to implementation without plan review approval

faq.question: What triggers the implementation-review skill?
faq.answer: The skill listens for completion keywords like "plan complete", "implementation done", "coding finished", or "ready for review" from the strategic-planner or main agent.

faq.question: Does this skill perform actual code review?
faq.answer: No. This skill acts as a coordinator that delegates to specialized review agents like plan-consultant and code-reviewer.

faq.question: Can I bypass the review if I am in a hurry?
faq.answer: The skill is designed as a mandatory quality gate. Reviews should not be skipped as they enforce project standards.

faq.question: What happens if a review returns BLOCKED status?
faq.answer: You must address the critical issues identified before proceeding. The skill will flag the findings for revision.

faq.question: Which workflow phases does this skill integrate with?
faq.answer: It integrates with the EPIC workflow: Explore -> Plan -> [Plan Review] -> Implement -> [Code Review] -> Commit.

faq.question: Can I customize the review criteria?
faq.answer: Review criteria are defined by the delegated review agents. You can configure their individual review focuses.
